sub_title: Business Consultant Information Management at Holland Casino
summary: IT Consulting and architect specialist with over several years of experience in working with large and small companies, helping the Business to understand the value of IT as a business enabler. My focus has always been on building and keeping strong relationships both inside and outside the organization with colleges,  stakeholders and suppliers to ensure I am continuously creating value for the business by optimize and digitize their processes with future-ready IT solutions. This with my analytical, accuracy, attention for the details and being flexible and pragmatic and critical view on the value, risk and responsibility. I have a special interest, skills and knowledge in architecture and integration of several IT solutions to priovide the best solutions with value for the business.

projects.title: Migrating SAP to AFAS
projects.description: Starting with a RFP in 2021 and responsabel for input on the business case, setting up the (non-fcuntional) requirements and the (ist and soll) ERP architecture landscape. Afther the choice of AFAS, we started with the implementation of AFAS in dec 2022 with going live on jan-2023 with HR, Finance and Procurement to AFAS. The project wil end at the end of Q1 2023.

projects.title: SAP GDPR
projects.description: Getting SAP HR GDPR compliant with our  Compliance team. The first focus was the inventory of the data that is being shared with other HR applications. Answering questions of the Compliance team, to indicate the most important measures to be taken for regulating and securing privacy data of employees in our ERP system.

contributors.headline: Business Consultant Information Management at Holland Casino

profile_positions.description:
As Business Consultant of the department Information Technology (IT) at Holland Casino (HC), 
I participate in 3 scrum (Agile) teams that delivers services to: Financial & Control(F&C), Purchasing (INK), Human Resources (HR) and the IT (operation and office) Workspace. 
Responsible for the architecture, innovation, optimization and digitizing the ERP landscape and IT Workspace, together with my product owners, business stakeholders, scrum team and suppliers. I maintain roadmaps and architecture using Enterprise Architect (migrating to BBlue Dolphin). Furthermore, I specified the (business) requirements, assist with business cases in the search of future-ready (standard) IT solutions. Digitize the business processes as much as possible to achieve high-quality data and offer the perfect IT Workspace (IT devices [laptop, desktop, mobile devices, telephony and peripherals] and MS Office applications) to support the operation in the office and casino.
Some achievements & experiences:
! Migration of SAP ERP (HR, F&C and INK) to AFAS (2022- present)
Integration HC On Line site with SAP Finance (2021) 
Robotics Process Automation for automating Finance processes (2020/2021)
Participate in getting SAP GDPR compliant
Implement EPI-USE Labs Data Sync Client and Object Sync (anonymize SAP data)
Implement SAP Identity Lifecycle Management
Implement SRXP Declaration solution
Implement SAP Employee and Management Self Services 
Implement SuccessFactors Performance & Goals and Learning
Implement Procure to Pay Solution (Proactis)
Implement SAP Travel&Expenses
Integration SAP with HR (cloud) applications:  Recruitment, Absent management, Planning management.
Integration SAP with with POS systems, Receptions, Horeca and Casino application environments.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant Information Management

profile_positions.description:
Activities:
Advising, designing, and implementing ICT Infrastructure solutions in business projects in the roles of team lead, senior technical (business applications and technical infrastructure) consultant and architect. My focus was primairy on the Casino applications in the operation. Building bridges between Business and IT supply organization by alignment of solutions and business needs with functional and technical designs.  As senior I also coach and coordinate my collages in my unit. 

Achievements:
- participate in and implementing the Holland Casino Loyalty program
- participate as IT architect designing Business Information Plan
- participate in and implementing Holland Casino On line (digital casino) integrations
- participate in and implementing the Holland Casino coinless and TiTo system
- participate as architect in IT project portfolio board
